result.eng: If you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.
result.ga: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duit
result.orig: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duit
result.html: Mura bhfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duitIf you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.
result.ponchtml: Mura ḃfuil tú te go leor tá cóta breise agam duitIf you are not warm enough, I have a spare coat for you.

result.eng: You are not obliged to vote if you don't want to.
result.ga: Níl aon dualgas ort vótáil mura mian leat
result.orig: Níl aon dualgas ort vótáil mura mian leat
result.html: Níl aon dualgas ort vótáil mura mian leatYou are not obliged to vote if you don't want to.
result.ponchtml: Níl aon dualgas ort vótáil mura mian leatYou are not obliged to vote if you don't want to.

result.eng: Well, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ga: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.orig: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadh
result.html: Bhuel is í an teilifís an fhadhb mar sin mura bhfuil tú ag caitheamh an iomarca ama sa gcithfholcadhWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel is í an teilifís an ḟaḋb mar sin mura ḃfuil tú ag caiṫeaṁ an iomarca ama sa gciṫḟolcaḋWell, the television is the problem then, unless you are spending too much time in the shower!

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
